name: Dead Media Explorer
description:
Explore a barren graveyard, while learning about old media artifacts. "Dead Media Explorer" is a first-person experience, where you as the player not only get to explore a procedurally-generated landscape, but also learn about the history of some of the world's most impactful technologies.
